Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Refactor: Reorganize repository for journal submission

- Add centralized config.py for path management \(replaces hardcoded OneDrive paths\)
- Restructure models/ with numbered prefixes \(01_, 02_, 03_\) reflecting layer hierarchy
- Move hierarchical model from scripts/ to models/ as main production model
- Create analysis/ directory for forecast and diagnostic scripts
- Create visualization/ directory for figure generation scripts
- Move legacy quadratic models to archive/
- Delete 8 auto-backup files \(*-aaagcuugggcu.py\)
- Add __init__.py files for Python package structure
- Add requirements.txt with pinned dependencies
- Add data/README.md documenting input file specifications
- Add archive/README.md explaining deprecated versions
- Update README.md with complete repository documentation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
